original_title: NFL History of the Cleveland Browns
overview: Browns football is not merely a pastime, or mere entertainment. It is a civic religion that is passed down through the generations. To be a Browns fan is to journey through all of life's varied emotions every Sunday, unwavering and steadfast throughout the years. Now, over 60 seasons' worth of moments and memories are captured in this two-DVD set. Through the lens of NFLÂ® Films, you'll see how a team turned into a tradition.
title: NFL History of the Cleveland Browns
